Posts.Content: Hi Ali Owl, I finished chemo end October 2014 and all my nails started splitting and flaking in February, they are just regaining their usual appearance and stopped splitting. My hair is also re growing more slowly but going for second cut tomorrow!! Wonder if the herceptin has something to do with the hair growth. Lyn xx
Posts.Title: neddys/moaning cows club !!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Lorraine, i have had 8 injections of herceptin and have experienced the same problems, I also had badly swollen ankles on the first few but this has eased with only slightly swollen feet since the sixth dose. I do walk for at least an hour and a half each day with my 2 dogs and this does seem to help although still have numbness in my feet. Lyn
Posts.Title: Are any of you having Herceptin injections?

Posts.Content: Hi Lorraine1m, I have my ibuprofen night cap as well! Not too far from Exeter I live between Newton Abbot and Torquay. Lyn
